thorwin.math.geo

Class Polygon2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.Polygon2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Polygon2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A closed polygon in 2-dimensional space

        Determine if this polygon is counter-clockwise
        Returns:

      • area

        public double area()
        Returns the area of the polygon. The area is negative if the polygon is defined clockwise.
        Returns:
        surface area

      • clip

        public java.util.Optional<Polygon2D> clip(Rectangle2D bounds)
        Clips everything outside the rectangular area. Will result in a new polygon if a polygon remains after clipping.
        Parameters:
        bounds - clipping rectangle
        Returns:
        the clipped polygon, if any
